GSD.description:
scsi: libfc: Fix array index out of bound exception

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.199 by commit 4921b1618045ffab71b1050bf0014df3313a2289. For more details please see the references link.
